dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark suite for various tasks in autonomous driving, including 3D object detection, tracking, and semantic segmentation, providing a comprehensive set of images and annotations.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: R. Satzoda
M. Trivedi
dcterms:description: A dataset specifically designed for evaluating lane estimation performance metrics, providing a basis for assessing the accuracy of lane detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: Road lane detection dataset

dcterms:creator: Z. Wang
W. Ren
Q. Qiu
dcterms:description: A dataset used for road lane annotations, which supports the development and evaluation of real-time lane detection networks.
dcterms:title: Dataset for road lane annotations

dcterms:description: A dataset used to verify if the dataset consists of images gathered in winter conditions, ensuring robustness of lane detection algorithms under varying weather conditions.
dcterms:title: Dataset for testing if the dataset consists of images gathered in winter conditions

dcterms:description: A dataset that assesses completeness, coverage, and equivalence classes for lane detection algorithms, ensuring comprehensive evaluation.
dcterms:title: Dataset completeness, coverage, and equivalence classes

dcterms:description: A dataset related to the gathering and labeling process for lane detection, focusing on the quality and accuracy of annotations.
dcterms:title: Dataset gathering and labeling

dcterms:description: A dataset used to verify if all road lanes were correctly annotated, ensuring the accuracy of lane detection systems.
dcterms:title: Dataset for verifying if all road lanes were correctly annotated

dcterms:description: A dataset assessing the consistency between two independent road lane annotations, ensuring reliability in lane detection.
dcterms:title: Consistency between two independent road lane annotations

dcterms:description: A dataset for evaluating the consistency of two subsets of annotations provided by two independent suppliers, ensuring quality in lane detection.
dcterms:title: Dataset for evaluating the consistency of two subsets of annotations provided by two independent suppliers

dcterms:description: A dataset for road lane detection that is incomplete, highlighting the need for comprehensive data collection.
dcterms:title: Dataset for road lane detection that is incomplete
